about.me: John York lives in Northern California and has been a Cardano enthusiast for over three years. Our team of techs keep Poem Stake Pool running 24/7/365. John's goal is to serve the Cardano community by reliably minting blocks on the Ouroboros proof-of-stake protocol, while also educating the community through social media and educational videos.
about.server: We are a secure stake pool. All secret & private keys are created on an air-gapped system, NEVER connected to the Internet and redundantly backed up to encrypted USB drives using AES-XTS Military Grade Encryption.
about.company: Poem Stake Pool (Ticker: POEM) is run by a sole owner with a healthy investment pledge. You can trust our security protocols; any of your staked ADA will receive optimal rewards and never miss a slot opportunity.
